name: api-test-suite-demo-service
description: Automated API test suite for Demo Service using Postman/Newman

scripts.test: newman run postman-collection.json -e postman-environment.json --reporters cli,json,html --reporter-json-export newman-report.json --reporter-html-export newman-report.html
scripts.test:ci: newman run postman-collection.json -e postman-environment.json --reporters cli,json,junit --reporter-json-export newman-report.json --reporter-junit-export newman-report.xml
scripts.test:verbose: newman run postman-collection.json -e postman-environment.json --reporters cli,json,html --reporter-json-export newman-report.json --reporter-html-export newman-report.html --verbose
